channel.title: CVE Feed for Reolink -- RLC-4XX series
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Reolink -- RLC-4XX series

item.title: CVE-2020-25169|2024-09-16T22:15:58.929Z -- reolink -- rlc-4xx%20series
item.description: The affected Reolink P2P products do not sufficiently protect data transferred between the local device and Reolink servers. This can allow an attacker to access sensitive information, such as camera feeds.

item.title: CVE-2020-25173|2024-09-16T20:47:12.070Z -- reolink -- rlc-4xx%20series
item.description: An attacker with local network access can obtain a fixed cryptography key which may allow for further compromise of Reolink P2P cameras outside of local network access
